title: Poongatru Puthithanathu Lyrics Moondram Pirai
stanzas:
Poongaatru pudhithaanathu
pudhu vazhvu sathiraaduthu
irandu uyirai inaithu vilaiyaadum
uyirai inaithu vilaiyaadum.

poovaani ponmegamum
un polae.
naalellaam vilaiyaadum

Poongaatru pudhithaanathu
pudhu vazhvu sathiraaduthu
irandu uyirai inaithu vilaiyaadum
uyirai inaithu vilaiyaadum.

en vazhvil nee vandhathu
vidhiyaanaal
nee endhan uyirandro.

Poongaatru pudhithaanathu
pudhu vazhvu sathiraaduthu
irandu uyirai inaithu vilaiyaadum
uyirai inaithu vilaiyaadum.
